sect2.title: Installation of Gzip
sect2.para: Install Gzip by running the following commands:

screen.userinput: ./configure --prefix=/usr && cp gzexe.in gzexe.in.backup && sed 's%"BINDIR"%/bin%' gzexe.in.backup > gzexe.in && make && make install && mv /usr/bin/gzip /bin && rm /usr/bin/{gunzip,zcat} && ln -sf gzip /bin/gunzip && ln -sf gzip /bin/zcat && ln -sf gunzip /bin/uncompress
